note: Cantril ladder question: “Please imagine a ladder, with steps numbered from 0 at the bottom to 10 at the top. The top of theladder represents the best possible life for you and the bottom of the ladder represents the worst possible life for you. On which step ofthe ladder would you say you personally feel you stand at this time?” World Value Survey question: "Taking all things together, would you say you are (i) Very happy, (ii) Rather happy, (iii) Not very happy or (iv) Not at all happy".
title: Happiness vs Life satisfaction
subtitle: Horizontal axis shows average scores of self-reported life satisfaction (Cantril ladder question in the Gallup World Poll). Vertical axis measures the share of people who say they are 'very happy' or 'rather happy' (World Value Survey).
